entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
